sasl_idle(3) SASL man pages sasl_idle(3)

NAME

sasl_idle - Perform precalculations during an idle period

SYNOPSIS

#include <sasl/sasl.h>

int sasl_idle( sasl_conn_t *conn)

DESCRIPTION

sasl_idle may be called during an idle period to allow the SASL library or any mechanisms to perform any necessary precalculation.

conn may be NULL to do precalculation prior to a connection taking place.

RETURN VALUE

Returns 1 if action was taken, 0 if no action was taken.

CONFORMING TO

RFC 4422

SEE ALSO

sasl(3)

10 July 2001 SASL
